igenumata daksha daru dariyan rasakata mulyamaya shishyathwa ha pasal upakarana laba demin mila kala nohaki sewawaka nirathawethi.thapowrudha, gunowrudha winayagaruka himinamak washayen prachalitha abhinawa nahimipanan wahanseta amarapura siri saddhammawansha maha nikaye migamuwa halawatha dedisawe pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka dhurandara siripanynyadara rewatha wansawathansa winaya kirthi shri gaurawa namaya sahithawa nayaka padawiya kanumuldeniye sugunawansha himiyanta pirinamime wishesha daham hamuwa jaala udamwita ashokarama wiharasthanayedi okthobar masa 6 wana iru dina paswaru 2.00 ta amathya patali champika ranawaka mahatha athin akthapathra pradanaya sidukirimatada niyamithawa thibini.migamuwa halawatha dedisawe pradhana sanghanayaka padawiyen pidum lada apa na himipananta niduk nirogi suwa prarthana karamu.janadhipathi sambandhikarana lekam wanshanatha wijesinha
